Text: nice movie please seed some good movies like khushboo [hema malini jitndra]

Thanks for this wonderful and touching movie.That was the golden era of simple yet inspiring and brilliant movies;that was the era of Gulzar,Hrishikesh Mukherjee and Basu Chaterjee.I do see shades of them in Raju Hirani but he still has a long way to go.
